author: AnchorOfTime
title: Screen accurate but somewhat lacking.
review: This set features 2 of Minecrafts' iconic Mobs, the explosive Creeper and the Skittish yet adorable Ocelot. The build process itself was fun, and the level of detail put into each of the figures is phenomenal, nearly a carbon copy of the in-game counterparts. My biggest gripe, however, is the lack of articulation in the Ocelot, namely the legs. I'd like to be able to pose my four-legged friend in a sitting position but the way the legs are constructed, especially the hind legs sitting in an underwell of sorts, makes it so you can't do anything more than have him standing, as well as the lack of upwards movement in the neck, currently all you can do is make him look forward or straight down. Other than that, though, overall i love this set, i'd recommend it to any fans of brick building.
